Text: O Chineke, ị jụla anyị, ị tịwawo anyị nʼike;
I meela ka ala a maa jijiji, ị dọwakwala ya;
I meela ka ndị gị gabiga ọnọdụ ihe isi ike;
Ma nye ndị na-atụ egwu gị, i weliela otu ọkọlọtọ
Were aka nri gị zọpụta anyị ma nyere anyị aka,
Chineke esitela nʼịdị nsọ ya kwuo, sị,
Moab bụ efere ịkwọ aka m,
Onye ga-akpọrọ m gaa nʼobodo e wusiri ike?
Ọ bụghị gị, O Chineke? Gị onye jụrụ anyị,
Nyere anyị aka ka anyị pụọ nʼaka ndị iro,
Site na Chineke, anyị ga-enwe mmeri,
